content.body: from MDN and [spec](https://tc39.es/ecma262/multipage/structured-data.html#sec-arraybuffer-objects) it seems that array buffers should be transferable
content.formatted_body: from MDN and spec it seems that array buffers should be transferable

content.body: But in WebGPU, they aren't. I'm trying to understand why are these called array buffers then?
